// Pivot 0, 0
int right_flipper[30] = {
	72, 0,
	78, 2,
	80, 6,
	80, 11,
	78, 16,
	73, 18,
	22, 17,
	9, 17,
	4, 15,
	0, 12,
	0, 7,
	3, 3,
	8, 2,
	22, 1,
	72, 0
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float right_flipper[30] = {
	0.900000f, 0.000000f,
	0.975000f, 0.111111f,
	1.000000f, 0.333333f,
	1.000000f, 0.611111f,
	0.975000f, 0.888889f,
	0.912500f, 1.000000f,
	0.275000f, 0.944444f,
	0.112500f, 0.944444f,
	0.050000f, 0.833333f,
	0.000000f, 0.666667f,
	0.000000f, 0.388889f,
	0.037500f, 0.166667f,
	0.100000f, 0.111111f,
	0.275000f, 0.055556f,
	0.900000f, 0.000000f
};
